column2: I love Biscoff biscuits but never heard of coffee so tried their hot chocolate and cream buscuits. Biscuits are costly and nothing special and I think I just paid the price of pier 39. Hot chocolate was good. The order taking guy was just doing his job like robit and easily did wrong with my order.just to mention you will get a sample biscoff biscuit with your order.

Thank you for sharing your feedback about your experience with Biscoff. We appreciate your love for Biscoff biscuits and your willingness to try our hot chocolate and cream biscuits. We apologize if you found the biscuits to be costly and not particularly special. We value your input and will take it into consideration to ensure we provide a better value for our customers.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the hot chocolate. We apologize for any mistakes with your order and any inconvenience caused by our order taking process. We will review our procedures to ensure more accurate and attentive service.  Thank you for mentioning the sample Biscoff biscuit that comes with your order. We hope this added touch enhances your overall experience.  We appreciate your patronage and hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

We were having dinner across from this place and the delicious scent of coffee enticed us to save room and come over for dessert after our meal.  Got a glazed donut, plus coffee and hot chocolate. All were very good.

We love hearing from our guests, Athena. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your experience at Biscoff. I will share this with the team and thank them for taking care of you. I hope you come see us again.

This place is a themed coffee station which gives free cookies with every coffee ordered.  I found the predominant colors of red and white as tasteful as the cookies. The cinnamon rolls could have been softer, they seemed stale. The salted caramel coffee was not exactly enticing.

Thank you for visiting us Bartika, and taking the time to write a review. We are sorry to see you did not have a the best experience possible. We do hope you give us another try next time you are in the area.

Was getting kind of chilly out on the pier when I spotted this Jen what a delicious cup of coffee I enjoyed every sip recommended if your in pier 39 and don’t get me started on the pastries what a delicious treat.

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Biscoff Coffee Corner on Pier 39! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your delicious cup of coffee and the pastries. It's great to know that our warm and cozy coffee shop provided the perfect respite from the chilly pier. We hope to see you again soon for another cup of coffee and some more delicious treats!
Had cappucino & Lotus waffle. coffee is regular, nothing special about it. Waffle was 10/10 especially if you like lotus as i do.

Thank you for taking the time to leave us a 5-star review, Mohamed. We appreciate your support and are glad to hear that you had a positive experience with us at Biscoff. I love this cookies ever since I had it at Delta airlines few years back 🤭Coffee was good especially with cookies of course. Love the coffee.. as much as I liked the spread... yummmm

1st time having Biscoff latte at biscoff cafe taste was good. Not very sweet. They had vegan donuts blueberry and Maple. Good variety of cookies.

Hi Priti, thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your latte and donut. We work hard to give our guests the best experience and I'm pleased to see we accomplished that on your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Good place to get a present for Biscoff lovers!

Thanks for coming in and we're looking forward to serving you again!

I like the design and theme of the place. I like how they give out cookies when you order a latte. I like the latte. It was very smooth and soft. I also ordered a biscoff banana smoothie. It tasted like a banana pudding with slight biscoff taste at the end

Hi Hye, thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our theme, free cookie, latte and smoothie. We work hard to give our guests the best experience and I'm pleased to see we accomplished that on your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

a fun little shop on pier 39 where you can purchase lotus biscoff (including the biscoff crème filled cookies) and coffee drinks. the biscoff latte was pretty nice, albeit not spectacular. i enjoyed getting to purchase a few biscuits as i have been missing them since leaving europe. if you’re into the lotus biscuits or need a quick coffee fix, this is your spot.
Hi Johna thank you for taking the time to leave a review and joining us for some coffee and biscuits. We are happy to see you enjoyed your experience. We hope to welcome you back in again soon.

This place is definitely a treat to visit if your into Biscoff and their products. We walked away with a smoothie and latte that were flavorful. They also have coffee beans which we had to buy. All together interesting store

My favorite cafe in the pier. Can’t have enough of the biscoff latte. Every time I go to the pier, I grab a cup of the latte and go sit watch the ocean. Very rich, creamy and tasty

Great place to grab a quick coffee. The cafe is wheelchair accessible and is very much consumer oriented. Wait time was nearly 5 minutes and the coffee & snacks here are budget friendly as well. The coffee I ordered was delicious and came with a biscotti too. 😋 One can add milk & sugar according to their preference right next to the counter once after the coffee is handed over. They had various types of milk available here! The staff here was helpful and courteous. Thanks!

Thank you for coming in. We are happy to see you enjoyed your experience. We are a local family owned and operated store and we strive to provide excellent experiences to every guest. We hope to see you back again soon.

I visited this store during my trip to the pier sometime back. I picked up a Hot Chocolate and a family pack of Biscoff cookies with Belgian chocolate. The Hot Chocolate was good, and it kept me warm when the cold winds were blowing at the end of the pier. I'm a fan of the caramelized crunchy Biscoff cookies. After tasting the ones with Belgian chocolate, I love Biscoff even more. The family pack had seven 3-pack. I relished every one of it. I wish I got Biscoff cookies in my city! Their staff was polite during my visit, and the checkout was quick. Biscoff Coffee Corner is a great spot to pick up a hot beverage and enjoy some delicious cookies while you're at the pier.

Thanks for coming in. I'm pleased to hear you had a nice experience with us and loved the cookies and hot chocolate.  We work hard to provide you the best experience when visiting us. I hope you come to see us again soon ❤️ Stay safe!

Good vibe! It reminds my mother. When I was young she loves to eat this cookies with coffee..

magai chinamu mate, this biscoff latte was the highlight of SF.  be sure to get one of these when you stop by
Wow! Jay, thank you for such a kind review, we're thrilled to hear that the Biscoff latte was your SF highlight! We hope to see you again soon!

I ordered an iced coffee and I was not offered any creamer or milk. Told the staff in English AND in Spanish that I wanted lactose free milk since I wasn't asked how I wanted the coffee. They didn't understand in either language. No wonder minimum wage still exists.

Thank you for sharing your experience at Biscoff Coffee Corner. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you encountered during your visit. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve our service, and we appreciate your patience.  We deeply regret that our staff did not understand your request for lactose-free milk in both English and Spanish. Miscommunication should never be an issue at our establishment, and we are taking immediate steps to rectify this situation.  We appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to improve. We hope you will give us another chance to serve you and provide the exceptional coffee experience we are known for. If you decide to visit us again, please let our staff know about your previous experience, and we will ensure that your future visit exceeds your expectations.  Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, and we look forward to the opportunity to regain your trust.
The cookies are the exact same as the ones you can get for free on airplanes. And i love them. Though you can buy them cheaper elsewhere. just a heads up.

The biscuits here taste really good. Biscoff started off as a biscuit provider for airlines in the united kingdoms and it gained international popularity, subsequently they expanded.  The plain biscuits were already good enough, if you're passing by you should definitely drop by and get some.

The service was not good at all. We were waiting for five coffees and it took her so long to prepare it. I could see her doing something else than doing our order. My boyfriend asked her why it wasn't okay, and she denied what she said. He told her off and we left. The coffee was normal. A bit too sweet for a latte. Coffee is ok.  Not at the same level as an independent coffee shop.  WiFi is painfully slow.  Also no seating of any kind.  Had to sit at the business next door.
